config.question: The intention of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is to __________.

choices.content: reduce the inequalities in health care by requiring all U.S. citizens and legal residents to have medical insurance
eliminate medical malpractice litigation and costs, guarantee insurance coverage to all people, and fund the training of many more medical professionals
coordinate socialized medicine that ensures all citizens the same level and quality of health care
provide a two-tiered system of medical care that will eliminate inequalities in health care

answer_3.response: sider this: the need to address the two-tier healthcare system found in the United States.
